mapper.select: select * from reserv join hotel on reserv.guest_no=${guest_no} and reserv.hotel_no = hotel.hotel_no join room on reserv.room_no = room.room_no
mapper.update: update reserv set rev_status = 1, canceldate = now(), pay_status = 2 where guest_no =#{guest_no} and imp_uid =#{imp_uid}
update guest set totalpoint = #{totalpoint} where guest_no = ${guest_no}
mapper.insert: insert into point ( guest_no, io_point, totalpoint, pointtype, date) values (#{guest_no}, (select used_point from reserv where guest_no = #{guest_no} and imp_uid = #{imp_uid}), (select totalpoint from guest where guest_no=#{guest_no}), 0, now())
mapper.update: update coupon set usedate = null, use_status = 0 where coupon_no = (select coupon_no from reserv where imp_uid = #{imp_uid})
update reserv set rev_status = 1, canceldate = now(), pay_status = 2 where reserv_no=#{reserv_no}
insert into point ( guest_no, io_point, totalpoint, pointtype, date) values (#{guest_no}, #{used_point}, (select totalpoint from guest where guest_no=#{guest_no}), 0, now())
update coupon set usedate = null, use_status = 0 where coupon_no =#{coupon_no}
